name: AWS Professional Services
short: A team within AWS that collaborates with customers to provide deep AWS product expertise, deliver value-driven methodology, and assist in building efficient solutions.
description: AWS Professional Services is a global team of experts that can help you realize your desired business outcomes when using the AWS Cloud. They collaborate with your team to execute your cloud initiatives, providing deep AWS technical and project expertise. Services include operational best practices, architectural design, migrations, and cloud strategy. Their approach is to leverage AWS-proven methodology, tools, and best practices to help you scale and move quickly. This helps you focus on your core business.
